Class ManagerDetail

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.datastore.BaseDatabaseHandler
comp3111.examsystem.datastore.ManagerDetail
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserDetail
public class ManagerDetail extends BaseDatabaseHandler implements UserDetail
Singleton class for managing system manager authentication details Implements UserDetail interface for user verification functionality
